com.illcode.meterman.impl

Class FrameImageManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.illcode.meterman.impl.FrameImageManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PlayerMovementListener

    public class FrameImageManager
extends Object
implements PlayerMovementListener
    FrameImageManager maintains a mapping from BaseRoom IDs to image names, and when the player moves rooms it will set the UI frame image accordingly.

    Particularly, with loadFromJson(java.lang.String), the entire setup of setting frame images can be kept in one JSON object in a text bundle.

      • init

        public void init()

        public static FrameImageManager retrieveFrom(Map<String,Object> worldData)

        public void deregister()

      • setRoomImageName

        public void setRoomImageName(String roomId,
                    String imageName)
        Set the image name associated with a given BaseRoom ID.
        Parameters:
        roomId - BaseRoom id. If equal to "default", set the default image name that will be used when the player moves to a room that doesn't have an explicitly entry in our map.
        imageName - image name. If equal to "default", the value of UIConstants.DEFAULT_FRAME_IMAGE will be used.

      • getRoomImageName

        public String getRoomImageName(String roomId)
        Get the image name associated with a given room ID. If the room doesn't have an entry in the FrameImageManager's map, it will return the "default" image name.

      • removeRoomImageName

        public void removeRoomImageName(String roomId)
        Remove roomId from our image map.

      • clear

        public void clear()
        Clear all roomId->imageName entries. The default image name is left unchanged.

      • getRoomImageMap

        public Map<String,String> getRoomImageMap()
        Return the roomId->imageName map being used.

      • setRoomImageMap

        public void setRoomImageMap(Map<String,String> roomImageMap)
        Set the roomId->imageName map used by this manager.

      • loadFromJson

        public void loadFromJson(String json)
        Loads roomId->imageName mappings from JSON data of this form: 
        {
     "imageName1" : "default",
     "imageName2" : "roomId1",
     "imageName3" : ["roomId2", "roomId3", ...]
     ...
 }
        default is a special "room ID" that is used if the ID of the current room is not specified explicitly in the mapping.

        This method replaces any mappings currently stored by the FrameImageManager.

        Parameters:
        json - JSON text

      • update

        public void update()
        Sets the frame image based on the current player room.

        This method shouldn't be called until world-state has been properly set in the GameManager. A good place to use it is in Game.start().

      • playerMove

        public boolean playerMove(Room from,
                 Room to,
                 boolean beforeMove)
        Implement PlayerMovementListener to change the frame image as the player moves rooms.
        Specified by:
        playerMove in interface PlayerMovementListener
        Parameters:
        from - the room the player is moving, or has moved, from
        to - the room the player is moving, or has moved, to
        beforeMove - true if this method is being called before the player moves, and false if the move has already occurred.
        Returns:
        true if the further processing of the player move command should be blocked; false to let processing continue as usual.
